sentences.english: The bleak frost packed and paved the square as with some ringing metal.

sentences.english: Her face was dry and pale, as though she regarded herself in the light of a murderess.

sentences.english: Aureate ray of light, spend the deadly pale on the not intentional face, also keep on covering up.

sentences.english: And the mother's pale face grew radiant.

sentences.english: Not much, if any of the pale fingertips jump, cold, frozen at the moment of memory.

sentences.english: I would rather see a young man blush than turn pale. ( M. P. Cato )

The moon sailed out from behind the clouds and lit up the chalky face.
